english: His clients were of the same feather .
chinese: 他的顾客都属于同一类型的人物。

english: We offer a personal service to our customers .
chinese: 我们为顾客提供个人服务。

english: I bless myself from such customers .
chinese: 不和这样一些顾客打交道真是谢天谢地。
